Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Wright, no run, pitched up and slanting away outside off, driven to mid-off

Mohammad Irfan to Wright, no run, banged in short on off, pulled in the air.... Does to carry. Badree dives to his right at square leg and stops the ball. He will have a bigger role to play with the ball
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, no run, Irfan generates extra lift outside off and beats Wright's cut
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, 2 runs, glanced off the pads to fine leg
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, no run, back of a length and extra bounce again, rushes onto the batsman and hits the pad
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, FOUR, Wright connects with the cut now. Shorter and outside off, square-cut away for four
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, skiddy leagbreak outside off, chopped to backward point
Badree to Wright, no run, nicely tossed up outside off, push driven into the covers
Badree to Wright, FOUR, darted short and outside off, Wright middles a cut and finds the gap in the covers as well
Badree to Wright, 1 run, legbreak outside off, slashed to short third man
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, lazy work from Irfan at short fine leg. He was lazy to go low to his right at short fine leg. Shehzad sweeps and tickles it away
Badree to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, four more for Shehzad. This was no tickle. He uses his feet and drives it handsomely past the covers
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, SIX, banged in short on off with Irfan's typical extra bounce as well. Wright lays into a pull. Hit flat and hard over backward square leg
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, SIX, this is fuller, Wright swipes it over midwicket. Big six.... And it's a crowd catch
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, 1 run, angled in on off from round the stumps, guided past backward point
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length around off, patted towards the covers
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, back of a length and outside off, Shehzad half-paddles and half-pulls behind square
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, angled outside off, Shehzad is happy to watch it through to the keeper
Russell to Wright, FOUR, banged in short but does not climb enough to test Wright. He picks the length up early. Rocks back and hammers the pull to the midwicket boundary
Russell to Wright, FOUR, short again, this is wide outside off. Wright flays a cut square on the off side
Russell to Wright, 2 runs, full on off, clipped through midwicket
Russell to Wright, FOUR, back of a length and outside, sliced behind square on the off side now
Russell to Wright, FOUR, low full toss, tripe ball on the leg stump. Easily whipped away past midwicket
Russell to Wright, no run, full and straight, worked to midwicket
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, drifts in on off and spins away, the batsman reads it off the pitch and pokes it behind square on off
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, Shehzad leans back and late-cuts it to point
Imran Khalid to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, spooned back to Khalid. This held up in the pitch further. Shehzad seeks to turn it to the leg side. He pops a return catch off a leading edge. Soft as wax
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c & b Imran Khalid 11 (9b 2x4 0x6) SR: 122.22']

Commentary: Imran Khalid to Pietersen, no run, nice and full, blocked on the front foot
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, 1 run, Fizzes off the surface on off, wristed behind square on the leg side
Imran Khalid to Wright, no run, non-turning ball on off, the batsman bends forward in defence
Rumman Raees to Pietersen, 1 run, leg-side ball, shortish in length. Picked up with the wrists over backward square leg
Rumman Raees to Wright, no run, rising short ball on off, Wright gets behind the line in defence
Rumman Raees to Wright, no run, full and sliding down leg, may have brushed the pad on its way to the keeper
Rumman Raees to Wright, no run, full and hits the pad, but pitched outside leg
Rumman Raees to Wright, 1 leg bye, full and on the pads, diverted behind square for one. Leg bye
Rumman Raees to Pietersen, 1 run, shortish and on middle, punched wristily to long-on
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, 1 run, low full toss, flicked to mid-on
Imran Khalid to Wright, 1 run, Wright backs away and slaps it to long-off
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, 1 run, pitched up and turns away outside off, driven to long-off
Imran Khalid to Wright, no run, slides on outside off, pushed to covers on the front foot
Imran Khalid to Wright, 1 run, flat ball on middle and leg, whipped behind square on the leg side
Imran Khalid to Pietersen, no run, drifts in on middle as KP blocks with a straight bat
Rumman Raees to Wright, 1 leg bye, full and homing in on the ankle, Wright misses his leg-side flick
Rumman Raees to Pietersen, 2 runs, back of a length on the leg stump, glanced fine
Rumman Raees to Pietersen, no run, darted into the pads again, KP can't connect with a flick now
Rumman Raees to Pietersen, 1 run, low full toss on the pads, clipped in front of square
Rumman Raees to Wright, 1 run, tucked off the pads behind square
Rumman Raees to Pietersen, no run, back of a length on middle, KP runs it back to the bowler with soft hands
Imran Khalid to Wright, FOUR, half-tracker on the stumps, Wright skips back and pulls over midwicket
Imran Khalid to Wright, no run, slides on middle and leg, bunted to the leg side
Imran Khalid to Wright, 1 run, short and spins away outside off, cracked to deep cover. Wright registers the first fifty of the PSL

Imran Khalid to Pietersen, OUT, Khalid has KP lbw. The left-arm spinner nabs him. Slides in with the arm, KP plays for the spin and is pinned in front of off and middle. The finger goes up. The tracker shows that it would have hit the top of middle; it would have just caressed the bails
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, the left-arm spinner lands this outside off and gets it to turn away. Defended
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen lbw b Imran Khalid 8 (12b 0x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, eased down the ground, to long-on for one
Mohammad Irfan to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, short ball on off, raps the batsman on the glove. Fended behind square
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, 1 run, banged in short and outside off, more evidence of Irfan's extra bounce. Pick-up shot to fine leg
Mohammad Irfan to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, Nawaz reaches out and stabs it to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, FOUR, full and outside off, Wright creams it past the covers. Nawaz pats his partner
Mohammad Irfan to Wright, 1 run, shortish, the batsman dabs a cut to third man. He had that extra second to play the ball late
Mohammad Irfan to Mohammad Nawaz, FOUR, back of a length and outside off, good old heave-ho. Nawaz finds the long-on boundary
Imran Khalid to Wright, SIX, juicy full toss on off, Wright goes low and slogs it over midwicket. Poor ball and duly put away
Imran Khalid to Wright, 1 run, slides in with the angle, inside edged to leg side
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, short and turns in, stabbed towards midwicket
Imran Khalid to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, Nawaz uses his feet and milks it to long-on
Imran Khalid to Wright, no run, straight ball on middle, defended into the covers
Imran Khalid to Wright, 1 run, squirted through the leg side off an inside snick
Watson to Wright, 1 run, full and straight, clipped easily behind square
Watson to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, back of a length on middle, dab-and-run single to cover
Watson to Wright, no run, low full toss on the pads as the batsman misses the flick. Heading down leg
Watson to Wright, no run, Watson almost tricks Wright. Slower ball on off, he is early into the drive. Wright ends up chipping it to the left of the diving Watson
Watson to Wright, 1 run, dragged short on off, Wright cracks a pull to deep midwicket
Watson to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, width outside off, Nawaz throws his hands at a drive. Sliced towards third man
Badree to Wright, no run, wicket-to-wicket line, pushed back to the bowler
Badree to Wright, FOUR, horrid short ball outside off, Wright pounces on it. Clubbed to the left of long-on; one-bounce four
Badree to Wright, 1 run, Badree pushes it flatter, swept away for one
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, low full toss, gently pushed to the covers
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, pitched up around off, tapped to cover again
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, googly? worked to the midwicket region
Watson to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, full and slanting away outside off, beats the cut
Watson to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, shorter ball on the stumps, Nawaz drags it over midwicket
Watson to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, full at the base of off, jabbed back to Watson
Watson to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, Nawaz goes for a big swipe, he hits it behind square off a thick inside edge
Watson to Wright, FOUR, poor ball. Full toss on off, Wright clears his front foot and sends it clattering over midwicket
Watson to Wright, no run, length ball on off, Wright targets the leg side with a slog. He has to settle with a skewered shot to point
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, width outside off, cut away square
Badree to Wright, no run, pushed through on off, played to the covers
Badree to Wright, 1 run, Wright uses his feet and clips a single behind square leg
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, no run, Nawaz charges at Badree, he does not meet the pitch and takes it on the pad
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, shorter and outside off, slapped over the covers
Badree to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, slides on outside off, run away towards short third man off an outside edge
Russell to Mohammad Nawaz, 2 runs, too full and outside off, lashed through backward point
Russell to Mohammad Nawaz, 1 run, short, rising ball outside off, Nawaz rides it neatly to third man
Russell to Wright, SIX, banged in short, Wright jumps on it, pulling it over midwicket with great authority
Russell to Wright, no run, Russell bangs a bouncer, Wright hunkers down and lets it pass over him to the keeper
Russell to Wright, no run, Russell goes wide of the crease and spears it too full, pushed back to the bowler
Russell to Wright, FOUR, Quetta Gladiators win the first match of the PSL. Looked like a slower ball on the pads, glanced to the fine leg boundary
